body.p: To further improve its ability to create online documentation, offers support to transform DocBook documents into mobile WebHelp systems.

To generate a mobile WebHelp system from your DocBook 5 document, go to the DITA Maps Manager view, click Configure Transformation Scenarios() and select the DocBook WebHelp - Mobile transformation scenario from the DocBook 5 section. Click Apply associated. Once finishes the transformation process, the output is opened in your default browser automatically.
